title: 2025 BIGGEST AGRICULTURE DRONE TRAILER | nuWay AG

tasks.task: Assemble a custom agricultural drone trailer for efficient crop monitoring and treatment.
subtasks: Construct a deck over 22-foot trailer suitable for large-scale farming operations.
Integrate a 32-foot flight deck for DJI T40 drone operation.
Install two DJI generators with charge boxes on the flight deck for power and cooling.
Route power to the upper deck for charging controllers and other equipment.
Equip with a Honda GX160 pump for water circulation at 200 gallons per minute.
Incorporate a 1000-gallon clear water tank and a 175-gallon induction tank for chemical mixing.
Weld the flight deck with Amish craftsmanship for durability and strength.
Develop a secret sauce feature with a solid floor construction to enhance efficiency in battery handling.
Include railing and hose management systems for safety and practical use.

tasks.task: Operate a drone for agricultural purposes using the new trailer.
subtasks: Charge drone batteries by transferring them from the flight deck charge boxes using two steps.
Monitor crop conditions from the specialized flight deck during aerial surveys.
Mix chemicals and transport water via the integrated tanks and pump system for targeted treatments.
